name: Grishka Marshborn
title: Innkeeper & Barkeep
description: A practical and no-nonsense orc with a fierce demeanor but a welcoming spirit for warriors. She runs The Glowing Lantern with efficiency and only allows strong, powerful music that befits warriors.

greeting.first_time: Welcome to The Glowing Lantern! I'm Grishka. We don't do fancy here—just strong drink, warm beds, and music fit for warriors! Rokgar at the door makes sure of that.
greeting.returning: Back again! What'll it be, warrior?
greeting.tired: Ye look beaten! Get a room, rest up. The swamp will still be here tomorrow.

off_duty.text: Taking a break! The inn's open—help yerself!

buy_drink.text: Strong beer, brewed tough like we are! Take a look!

ask_rent_room.text: Room's 50 gold. Solid bed, dry roof. Better than the swamp! Interested?

confirm_rent_room.success: Good! Yer room is upstairs. Sleep well, warrior!
confirm_rent_room.failure: Ye need 50 gold for a room. Come back when ye got it!

ask_about_shows.text: We have shows at 9 PM every night! But listen—Rokgar at the door only lets in strong, powerful music. Drums, horns, battle chants! None of that soft stuff! Book before 8 PM. Want to see tonight's lineup?

see_available_shows.text: Let's see what warriors are playin' tonight...
